related_questions.question:
1. He opens the door    2.We set the tbale 
3.The pays a lot of money
4.I draw a picture
5.They wear blue shoes
6.They don't help you
7.He doesn't open the book
8.You do not write the letter

ubah ke exercise on passive voice
bantu jawab ya​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. The door is opened by him.

2. The table is set by us.

3. A lot of money is paid by them.

4. A picture is drawn by me.

5. Blue shoes are worn by them.

6. You are not helped by them.

7. The book is not opened by him.

8. The letter is not written by you.

b. I have made enquiries about the cost of the repairs you mention in your letter of ....

Jawaban:

OCTOGENARIAN PROTEST  

Pensioner Maude Jennings I. celebrated her eightieth birthday outside Avonhurst Town yesterday. She was one of a large group who 2. protests against the plans for a tunnel under the River Severn. Maude's tiny cottage may 3. be demolished when new roads to the tunnel 4. are built. Maude was born in the cottage, which 5. was built in the 18th century, and the entrance of the tunnel will be built at the ends of her garden. Maude /. consulted our reporter, 'I 8. have been told by the planners, and I 9. will never leave my lovely home. I 10. have lived there for eighty years!  

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Simple Past Tense, Simple Present Tense, Present Perfect Tense, Simple Future Tense, Modal Verbs dan Passive Voice.

Simple Past Tense:

Nominal: (+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Adjective

Verbal: (+) Subject + Verb-2 + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Verb-3

Simple Present Tense:

Verbal: (+) Subject + Verb-1 S/ES + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Tobe (is/am/are) + Verb-3

Present Perfect Tense

(+) Subject + Have/Has + Verb-3

Simple Future Tense:

(+) Subject + Will + Verb-1 + Object

Modal Verbs:

Active: (+) Subject + Modal Verbs (May/Will) + Verb-1 + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Modal Verbs (May/Will) + Be + Verb-3

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
The Republic of Indonesia is one of the    Southeast Asian countries. The country is a
highly diverse island archipelago consisting
of around 13,000 islands along the equator
between Asia and Australia. The five
principal islands are Sumatera, Java,
Kalimantan, Sulawesi and Papua (the western
part of New Guinea island). It has a
population of 242 million (2005) that
comprises of about 3,000 ethnic groups.
Indonesia is currently the world's fourth most
populous nation, after China, India and the
US. With a GDP per capita of USD 1420 (USD
3310 in PPP terms), the country is classified
as a lower-middle-income country (World
Bank 2008).​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Negara Kesatuan Republik Indonesia merupakan salah satu

negara-negara Asia Tenggara. Negara adalah

kepulauan yang sangat beragam terdiri dari

dari sekitar 13.000 pulau di sepanjang khatulistiwa

antara Asia dan Australia. lima

pulau utama adalah Sumatera, Jawa,

Kalimantan, Sulawesi dan Papua (bagian barat)

bagian dari pulau New Guinea). Ini memiliki

populasi 242 juta (2005) itu

terdiri dari sekitar 3.000 kelompok etnis.

Indonesia saat ini terbesar keempat di dunia

negara berpenduduk padat, setelah Cina, India, dan

KAMI. Dengan PDB per kapita USD 1420 (USD

3310 dalam istilah PPP), negara diklasifikasikan

sebagai negara berpenghasilan menengah ke bawah (World

Bank 2008).
